thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Levallois Perret - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Levallois-Perret, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ok for a short stay
thread.title_full: Ok for a short stay - Review of Ibis Paris Levallois Perret, Levallois-Perret, France - TripAdvisor

author: bvwaeyen
title: Ok for a short stay
text:
Room was really small, but clean. Same applies to the bathroom. The central heating was a bit too noisy for me. Bed and pillows were great: soft and thick. Breakfast was ok, nothing special and choice was a bit limited. But the food they served tasted well.
It's a 40min walk to the centre. 8min when you take the metro.
